code: @Manual{,   title = {icepalace: Snapshot Current Versions of CRAN-like Repositories},   author = {Maëlle Salmon and Jeroen Ooms},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9004},   url = {https://github.com/ropenscilabs/icepalace}, }

what: Snapshot Current Versions of CRAN-like Repositories
title: Snapshot Current Versions of CRAN-like Repositories
text: goal package download entire CRAN-like repositories, instance R-universe repositories use archive frozen snapshot. frozen snapshot kept locally, instance served GitHub Pages. might useful reproducibility. goal package also snapshot dependencies repository packages repository. want exhaustive snapshot, use tools like MRAN RStudio Package Manager.

title: Snapshot Current Versions of CRAN-like Repositories
text: can install development version icepalace GitHub :

title: Snapshot Current Versions of CRAN-like Repositories
text: Let’s snapshot mrc-ide R-universe repository install dde repo. default binaries downloaded latest released version R (rversions::r_release()). type includes win.binary mac.binary (default, type includes source kinds binaries), binary R version, function warn. package (instance typo URL), function error.
code: library(icepalace) # In real life do not use a temporary directory :-) destdir <- withr::local_tempdir() snapshot_package_repository("https://mrc-ide.r-universe.dev", destdir = destdir) fs::dir_tree(destdir) #> /tmp/RtmprFXQAF/fileb97b14f07edc #> ├── bin #> │   ├── macosx #> │   │   └── contrib #> │   │       └── 4.2 #> │   │           ├── PACKAGES #> │   │           ├── PACKAGES.gz #> │   │           ├── PACKAGES.json #> │   │           ├── beers_0.1.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── buildr_0.0.3.tgz #> │   │           ├── conan_0.1.1.tgz #> │   │           ├── context_0.3.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── dde_1.0.3.tgz #> │   │           ├── defer_0.1.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── didehpc_0.3.12.tgz #> │   │           ├── dust_0.11.27.tgz #> │   │           ├── heartbeatr_0.6.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── individual_0.1.8.tgz #> │   │           ├── jsonvalidate_1.4.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── malariaEquilibrium_1.0.1.tgz #> │   │           ├── malariasimulation_1.3.0.tgz #> │   │ │           ├── porcelain_0.1.8.tgz #> │   │           ├── provisionr_0.1.14.tgz #> │   │           ├── queuer_0.3.0.tgz #> │   │           ├── rrq_0.5.7.tgz #> │   │           ├── specio_0.1.4.tgz #> │   │           ├── syncr_0.0.3.tgz #> │   │           ├── traduire_0.0.6.tgz #> │   │           └── vaultr_1.1.0.tgz #> │   └── windows #> │       └── contrib #> │           └── 4.2 #> │               ├── PACKAGES #> │               ├── PACKAGES.gz #> │               ├── PACKAGES.json #> │               ├── beers_0.1.0.zip #> │               ├── buildr_0.0.3.zip #> │               ├── conan_0.1.1.zip #> │               ├── context_0.3.0.zip #> │               ├── dde_1.0.3.zip #> │               ├── defer_0.1.0.zip #> │               ├── didehpc_0.3.12.zip #> │               ├── malariasimulation_1.3.0.zip #> │               ├── mcstate_0.9.1.zip #> │               ├── nomad_0.0.1.zip #> │               ├── odin.dust_0.2.16.zip #> │               ├── odin.js_0.1.11.zip #> │ PACKAGES #>         ├── PACKAGES.gz #>         ├── PACKAGES.json #>         ├── beers_0.1.0.tar.gz #>         ├── buildr_0.0.3.tar.gz #>         ├── conan_0.1.1.tar.gz #>         ├── context_0.3.0.tar.gz #>         ├── dde_1.0.3.tar.gz #>         ├── defer_0.1.0.tar.gz #>         ├── didehpc_0.3.12.tar.gz #>         ├── dust_0.11.27.tar.gz #>         ├── heartbeatr_0.6.0.tar.gz #>         ├── individual_0.1.8.tar.gz #>         ├── jsonvalidate_1.4.0.tar.gz #>         ├── malariaEquilibrium_1.0.1.tar.gz #>         ├── malariasimulation_1.3.0.tar.gz #>         ├── mcstate_0.9.1.tar.gz #>         ├── nomad_0.0.1.tar.gz #>         ├── odin.dust_0.2.16.tar.gz #>         ├── odin.js_0.1.11.tar.gz #>         ├── odin_1.3.4.tar.gz #>         ├── porcelain_0.1.8.tar.gz #>         ├── provisionr_0.1.14.tar.gz #>         ├── queuer_0.3.0.tar.gz #>         ├── rrq_0.5.7.tar.gz #>         ├── specio_0.1.4.tar.gz #>         ├── syncr_0.0.3.tar.gz #>         ├── traduire_0.0.6.tar.gz #>         └── vaultr_1.1.0.tar.gz  repo <- sprintf("file:///%s", destdir) repo #> [1] "file:////tmp/RtmprFXQAF/fileb97b14f07edc" install.packages("dde", repos = c(rlib = repo, CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) #> Installation du package dans '/home/maelle/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.2' #> (car 'lib' n'est pas spécifié) #> installation de la dépendance 'ring'  pkg_info <- sessioninfo::package_info("dde") pkg_info[pkg_info$package == "dde",] #>  package * version date (UTC) lib source #>  dde       1.0.3   2022-05-31 [1] https://mrc-ide.r-universe.dev (R 4.2.0) #>  #>  [1] /home/maelle/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.2 #>  [2] /opt/R/4.2.0/lib/R/library snapshot_package_repository("https://mrc-ide.r-universe.dev", type = "win.binary", r_version = "3.3") #> Warning: ✖ Can't find any package win.binary for repository `https://mrc-ide.r-universe.dev/bin/windows/contrib/3.3`. #> ℹ Maybe try another R version? snapshot_package_repository("https://_blop_.r-universe.dev") #> Error in `snapshot_package_repository_src()` at icepalace/R/snapshot.R:35:4: #> ! ✖ Can't find any package source for repository `https://_blop_.r-universe.dev`.

title: Snapshot a Package Repository — snapshot_package_repository
code: snapshot_package_repository(   url,   destdir = basename(url),   type = c("source", "mac.binary", "win.binary"),   r_version = NULL )

title: Snapshot a Package Repository — snapshot_package_repository
text: url URL CRAN-like repository. destdir Folder save archives. type Type package archives. r_version R version (character vector)

text: change README example show curated set packages

text: vectorize R version better handle absence binaries given R version (#5)
